title: Ep 20: Probably a Fire Crotch feat. Taylor Monaco
itunes:title: Ep 20: Probably a Fire Crotch feat. Taylor Monaco
description: Back in Shannon’s kitchen for a life update with BFF, Taylor Monaco. They discuss Tay adjusting to having 2 babies now and how living basically next door to each other is going. The duo gives some advice on dating, cheating, and friendships. The girls read some spicy and gross confessions, and tell some of their own. They spill the tea on significant others and what their families really think about their social media presence. Ever clogged a toilet at a hookup's house? Do the carpets really match the drapes? Find out in Season 2 Episode 6 of Probably a Fire Crotch… oh shit, we mean Probably a Podcast.
